Setting Uplinks and FC Ports

In this option you can configure Uplink and FC Ports.

To configure uplinks and FC ports, perform the following:

 1. In the Ethernet uplink and FC uplink ports, click Configure Uplink & FC Ports to view the available ports for primary and failover machine.

Figure 4-4 Uplink and FC Ports

 

You will notice the remaining ports as shown in the below figure.

Note Ports that are available and have not been utilized as server ports are displayed here.

Figure 4-5 Ethernet and FC Uplink Ports

 2. Select the desired ports from the Available Ports in FI A and FI B and click Add to Eth Uplink. The Ethernet uplink ports F1 A & B are assigned with FI ID, Port ID, Slot ID and User Label.

 3. Select the desired ports from the Available Ports in FI A and FI B and click Add to FC Uplink. The FC uplink ports F1 A & B are assigned with FI ID, Port ID, Slot ID and User Label.

Note • It is recommended to select both the primary and failover ports for Ethernet and FC uplink ports.

 • Only odd ports can be assigned to FC Uplink. Starting from the selected port id all the ports will be assigned as FC Uplink ports.

 • You can edit or update the name of User Label alone.

 4. Click Save to save the Ethernet and FC uplink ports.

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further.
